message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you. I believe it's a great opportunity for you to acquire a valuable asset. As we start the negotiation, I'm willing to offer you the product at a price of $1,200,000.
Alice, thanks for the offer, but $1,200,000 is a bit high for me. Given the value I see in the product, I'm willing to pay $850,000. Let's see if we can find common ground.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $850,000 is a bit low for me, but I'm willing to compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,100,000. I think this is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.

Alice, I appreciate you coming down a bit. However, $1,100,000 is still a bit too high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $950,000. This is a fair offer that reflects the value of the product to me. Let's work together to reach a mutually agreeable price.

Bob, I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to go down to $950,000. However, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,050,000. This is a fair price considering the value it holds for you.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $1,050,000 is still a bit out of my range.  I'm sticking with my previous offer of $950,000.  This is a fair price that reflects the value of the product to me. If we can't agree on this, I'll have to consider other options.

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go back to $950,000. I'm willing to make one more compromise. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,025,000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any lower.

Alice, I understand this is your final offer, but it's still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $975,000.  This reflects the value of the product to me, and I believe it's a fair compromise.  If we can't agree on this, I'll have to look at other options.

Bob, I understand your persistence, but I'm not willing to go up to $975,000. I've already compromised a lot, and I'm not willing to give up any more. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1,000,000. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to go any higher.
